main event: A civilian resident of Corpus Christi, Texas, observed a white light moving at a high rate of speed on 7-30-58.
interesting points: The light approached from the southwest and seemed to be orbiting around an object., The light was abnormally bright but produced no sound., The total duration of the sighting was approximately 15 seconds., The observer reported the object as an unidentified flying object., The sighting occurred at 10:55 PM.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: civilian resident of Corpus Christi, Texas
